home.type: Hello, I am Seoyeon Hong, a developer who codes with value.

introduce1.title: A Developer Who Codes with Value
introduce1.content: Rather than simply implementing features, I strive to become a developer who delivers value—such as convenience, enjoyment, and efficiency—to users through code.

introduce2.title: Every Experience Fuels Growth
introduce2.content: I believe that every experience leaves room for growth, and I enjoy taking on diverse challenges. I aim to become a developer with both deep expertise and broad experience.

introduce3.title: Stronger Together
introduce3.content: I believe we grow more when we help and communicate with each other. Just like open source projects evolve through shared problems and solutions, I strive to become a developer who collaborates and grows through continuous communication.

contents: Designed and implemented component-based UI
Utilized Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext, useRef)
Implemented SPA routing using React Router
Styled using tools such as Styled-components and TailwindCSS
Managed state with Zustand
Project experience with Next.js
Used modern ES6+ syntax (destructuring, arrow functions, etc.)
Handled asynchronous operations (async/await, fetch, axios)
Ensured type safety with TypeScript
Wrote semantic and accessible HTML markup
Built responsive layouts with Flexbox and Grid
Understood basic SEO structure and web accessibility
Designed and developed RESTful APIs
Implemented data CRUD logic with JPA
Applied layered architecture and wrote test code
Applied object-oriented programming and design patterns
Handled exception handling and wrote unit tests
Experience in Android app development using Java
Built simple web servers with Flask
Performed image processing and object detection using OpenCV
Wrote basic SQL queries and JOIN statements
Designed and normalized database tables
Used branching strategies (feature, release, hotfix)
Collaborated via Pull Requests and code reviews
Built CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
Collaborated on UI/UX design
Created prototypes and user flow designs
Worked with Ubuntu on VirtualBox and AWS EC2 environments
Executed basic shell commands and configured server environments
